text:
October 16, 1959
Mr* Ken Keger
Operations Manager
KUOW
The University of Washington
Seattle 5, Washington
Dear Ken:
A paper of the type which you had Tom Scheidel read
at the Western States Speech meeting would be excellent* X
sincerely hope that you can attend to read and discuss your
paper in person but, in the event that you cannot, X believe
that the paper should be read by someone whom you select* X
hop® also that you would be able to discus® the research -
procedures, etc* — with this person so that he could answer
questions about it if they come up*
Hope that we see you in Detroit*
Sincerely,
SLB:
Samuel L* Becker
Director, Division of
Telavision-Radio-Film
